detaileddescription.para:
wrapper function, used for bubbles.
integrand
a
: lower limit for integration
b
: upper limit for integration
w1
: unused
w2
: unused

memberdef.argsstring: (Integrand &integrand, double a, double b, double w1, double w2, double Delta, const bool isinf=false) -> std::result_of_t< Integrand(double)>
memberdef.name: integrator

detaileddescription.para:
Wrapper function for bubbles and loops, splitting the integration domain along difficult features.
a
: lower limit for integration
b
: upper limit for integration
w1
: first frequency where features occur
w2
: second frequency where features occur
Delta
: with of window around the features which should be integrated separately (to be set by hybridization strength)
